designScenario.description: The Collision Avoidance System is a state-of-the-art avionics solution engineered to identify, evaluate, and mitigate potential mid-air collision threats. Integrating a variety of advanced sensors (radar, ADS-B, Lidar), real-time data fusion, predictive analyses, and automated alert and evasive control functionalities, this system enhances flight safety by providing timely collision risk assessments and facilitating immediate corrective maneuvers. The system is designed to operate under extreme environmental and electromagnetic conditions typical in modern passenger airplanes.
designScenario.name: Collision Avoidance System

details.description: Continuously monitor the airspace around the aircraft using a network of sensors to identify possible collision threats.
Process real-time sensor data to detect critical near-infrared obstacles, aircraft, and non-cooperative targets.
Process sensor fusion within a 10ms cycle to ensure near instantaneous responsiveness to potential threats.
Maintain detection accuracy within ±5% relative error across the sensor array.
Automatically initiate alert and evasive maneuver protocols upon collision risk detection.
Ensure fail-safe operation through redundant configurations and automatic fault recovery mechanisms.
Operate reliably under extreme temperatures (-40°C to +85°C) and high electromagnetic interference conditions.
Adhere to aerospace standards for durability, cybersecurity, and environmental stability.

relationships.description: The Sensor Suite provides real-time environmental data to the Data Fusion Module for aggregating collision relevant inputs.
The Data Fusion Module processes sensor inputs and forwards consolidated data to the Collision Prediction Engine.
The Collision Prediction Engine evaluates potential collision threats and triggers the Alert & Evasion Module for response actions.
The Alert & Evasion Module communicates with the Flight Control Computer to execute recommended evasive maneuvers.

rag_context: The Collision Avoidance System is designed to continuously monitor the surrounding airspace for potential threats and calculate evasive maneuvers to prevent mid-air collisions. It incorporates advanced sensor technologies to detect and track nearby aircraft, providing real-time data to the autopilot system for swift decision-making. The system's response time is crucial, ensuring rapid and accurate collision alerts and avoidance actions. Redundancy features are implemented to maintain operational integrity even in the event of sensor failures. Additionally, the Collision Avoidance System complies with aviation regulations and standards to enhance overall flight safety.
